text: The Chief Justice of Afghanistan is the head of the Afghan Supreme Court. The incumbent chief justice is Abdul Salam Azimi. ==List of chief justices, 2001-present== *Faisal Ahmad Shinwari (2001–2006), was member of the Islamic Dawah Organisation of Afghanistan *Abdul Salam Azimi (2006–present), a former professor at the University of Arizona in the United States ==List of chief justices before 2001== *Abdul Salam (under Taliban rule) *Abdul Karim Shadan (pre-Taliban) http://www.unhcr.org/refworld/pdfid/3ae6a9d214.pdf ==References== Category:Politics of Afghanistan Afgh
title: Chief Justice of Afghanistan
